equipments = {
	   #
	  # #   #####   ####  #    # ###### ##### #   # #####  ######  ####
	 #   #  #    # #    # #    # #        #    # #  #    # #      #

	small_fighter_airframe = {
		year = 1933				# Limits the equipment from appearing before the specified year. Optional
		can_be_produced = {		# Optional, specifies when equipment of this category can be produced.
			NOT = {
				has_idea = BUL_treaty_of_neuilly_sur_seine
				has_idea = HUN_treaty_of_trianon
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = AI_purge_production
			}
		}
		is_archetype = yes		# Specifies an entry as an archetype entry. All non-archetype entries inherit
		is_convertable = yes
		picture = archetype_fighter_equipment
		is_buildable = no		# Prevents this equipment from being built.
		#set base type & mission
		type = { fighter }		# Internal type: what kind of unit can use this equipment
		type_override = fighter_role_slot
		allowed_types = {
			fighter
			# tactical_bomber
		 	# suicide
		}
		allow_mission_type = training
		forbid_mission_type = strategic_bomber

		group_by = archetype	# How the equipment is grouped in the production screen
		sprite = light_plane
		air_map_icon_frame = 1
		interface_category = interface_category_air	# Which category the equipment appears in the production screen
		# Fighter
		interface_overview_category_index = 0

		substitute = small_fighter_multirole_airframe

		air_superiority = 1		# Modifiers the equipment uses
		reliability = 1
		#Space taken in convoy
		lend_lease_cost = 3.0
		manpower = 20

		build_cost_ic = 4
		resources = {			# Resources used to build this equipment
			coal = 2
			rubber = 1
		}
		module_slots = {
			fighter_role_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					fighter_role_category
				}
			}
			engine_bay_slot = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			nose_slot_1 = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_armament_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			wing_armament_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_construction_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_engine_type_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_armour_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			fixed_protection_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_ammo_slot = {	# unlocked via guns
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			internal_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			internal_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			internal_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_crew_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			fixed_crew_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			fixed_crew_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = armoured_glass_light
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = fire_suppression
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = pressurized_cockpit
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = oxygen_masks
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = ejection_seats
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = g_suit
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = flak_vests
			count < 1
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = self_sealing_fuel_tanks
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = self_sealing_fuel_tanks_large
			count < 1
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = fuel_tanks_large
			count < 1
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			category = plane_special_module_air_air_radar
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			category = plane_special_module_air_ground_radar
			count < 2
		}
	}
	cv_small_fighter_airframe = {
		year = 1933
		can_be_produced = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = BUL_treaty_of_neuilly_sur_seine
				has_idea = HUN_treaty_of_trianon
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = WA_bob_production_flag
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = AI_purge_production
			}
		}

		is_archetype = yes
		is_convertable = yes
		carrier_capable = yes
		default_carrier_composition_weight = 1
		picture = archetype_fighter_equipment
		is_buildable = no
		type = fighter
		ai_type = cv_fighter

		allowed_types = {
			fighter
			# interceptor
			# cas
			# naval_bomber
			# suicide
		}
		allow_mission_type = training

		group_by = archetype
		sprite = light_plane
		air_map_icon_frame = 1
		interface_category = interface_category_air
		# CV Fighter
		interface_overview_category_index = 12

		air_superiority = 1
		reliability = 1
		surface_detection = 5
		sub_detection = 0
		#Space taken in convoy
		lend_lease_cost = 3.0
		manpower = 20

		build_cost_ic = 4
		resources = {
			coal = 2
			rubber = 1
		}

		module_slots = {
			engine_bay_slot = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			nose_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_armament_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			wing_armament_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_construction_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_engine_type_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_armour_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			fixed_protection_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_ammo_slot = {	# unlocked via guns
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			internal_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			internal_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			internal_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_crew_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			fixed_crew_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}

			fixed_crew_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = armoured_glass_light
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = self_sealing_fuel_tanks
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = fire_suppression
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = pressurized_cockpit
			count < 2

	small_fighter_multirole_airframe = {
		year = 1933				# Limits the equipment from appearing before the specified year. Optional
		can_be_produced = {		# Optional, specifies when equipment of this category can be produced.
			NOT = {
				has_idea = BUL_treaty_of_neuilly_sur_seine
				has_idea = HUN_treaty_of_trianon
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = AI_purge_production
			}
		}
		is_archetype = yes		# Specifies an entry as an archetype entry. All non-archetype entries inherit
		is_convertable = yes
		picture = archetype_fighter_equipment
		is_buildable = no		# Prevents this equipment from being built.
		#set base type & mission
		type = { fighter }		# Internal type: what kind of unit can use this equipment
		type_override = fighter_role_slot
		allowed_types = {
			fighter
			# tactical_bomber
		 	# suicide
		}
		allow_mission_type = training
		forbid_mission_type = strategic_bomber

		group_by = archetype	# How the equipment is grouped in the production screen
		sprite = light_plane
		air_map_icon_frame = 14
		interface_category = interface_category_air	# Which category the equipment appears in the production screen
		# Fighter
		interface_overview_category_index = 1

		substitute = small_fighter_airframe

		air_superiority = 1		# Modifiers the equipment uses
		reliability = 1
		#Space taken in convoy
		lend_lease_cost = 3.0
		manpower = 20

		build_cost_ic = 4
		resources = {			# Resources used to build this equipment
			coal = 2
			rubber = 1
		}
		module_slots = {
			fighter_role_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					fighter_role_category
				}
			}
			engine_bay_slot = {
				required = no

			fixed_protection_slot_1 = {
				required = no

			fixed_protection_slot_2 = {

	small_bomber_airframe = {		# Naval Bombers in x_plane_airframes
		year = 1933
		can_be_produced = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = BUL_treaty_of_neuilly_sur_seine
				has_idea = HUN_treaty_of_trianon
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = AI_purge_production
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					tag = USA
				}
			}
		}

		is_archetype = yes
		is_convertable = yes
		picture = archetype_CAS_equipment
		is_buildable = no

		type = cas
		type_override = fuselage_mount_slot_1
		allowed_types = {
			cas
			naval_bomber
			# suicide
		}
		allow_mission_type = training
		forbid_mission_type = air_superiority
		forbid_mission_type = interception
		forbid_mission_type = strategic_bomber

		group_by = archetype
		sprite = light_plane
		air_map_icon_frame = 2
		interface_category = interface_category_air
		# CAS
		interface_overview_category_index = 2

		substitute = cv_small_bomber_airframe

		air_superiority = 1
		reliability = 1
		surface_detection = 5
		sub_detection = 1
		#Space taken in convoy
		lend_lease_cost = 3.0
		manpower = 20

		build_cost_ic = 4
		resources = {
			coal = 2
			rubber = 1
		}

		module_slots = {
			nose_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					nose_prop_mg_2x
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					small_bomb_locks
				}
			}
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					drop_tanks
					small_bomb_locks
				}
			}
			fixed_construction_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					construction_material
				}
			}
			fixed_engine_type_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					air_cooled_bmw_801_1x
				}
			}
			fixed_ammo_slot = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = armoured_glass_light
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = self_sealing_fuel_tanks
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = fire_suppression
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = pressurized_cockpit
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = oxygen_masks
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = ejection_seats
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = g_suit
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = flak_vests
			count < 1
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = self_sealing_fuel_tanks_large
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = fuel_tanks_large
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			category = plane_special_module_air_air_radar
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			category = plane_special_module_air_ground_radar
			count < 2
		}

		default_modules = {
			nose_slot_1 = empty
			wing_mount_slot_1 = empty
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = empty
			fixed_construction_slot = empty
			fixed_engine_type_slot = empty
			fixed_ammo_slot = empty
		}
	}
	cv_small_bomber_airframe = {	# CV Naval Bombers in x_plane_airframes
		year = 1933
		can_be_produced = {
			OR = {
				is_ai = no
				tag = USA
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = AI_purge_production
			}
			NOT = {
				has_idea = BUL_treaty_of_neuilly_sur_seine
				has_idea = HUN_treaty_of_trianon
			}
		}

		is_archetype = yes
		is_convertable = yes
		carrier_capable = yes
		default_carrier_composition_weight = 1
		picture = archetype_CAS_equipment
		is_buildable = no

		type = cas
		ai_type = cv_cas
		type_override = fuselage_mount_slot_1
		allowed_types = {
			cas
			naval_bomber
			suicide
		}
		allow_mission_type = training
		forbid_mission_type = air_superiority
		forbid_mission_type = interception
		forbid_mission_type = strategic_bomber

		group_by = archetype
		sprite = light_plane
		air_map_icon_frame = 2
		interface_category = interface_category_air
		# CV CAS
		interface_overview_category_index = 13

		air_superiority = 0.01

		lend_lease_cost = 3.0

			coal = 2

			module = ejection_seats
			count < 2
		}
		module_count_limit = {

	# fighter
	ITA_cr_32_airframe = {	# Fiat CR.32 `Chirri`
		year = 1935
		is_frame = no
		archetype = small_fighter_airframe
		is_convertable = yes
		priority = 5

		air_range = 780
		maximum_speed = 372
		air_agility = 41.7	#43
		air_defence = 6
		build_cost_ic = 12
		weight = 9.3

		module_slots = {
			fighter_role_slot = {

		abbreviation = "afs0"

		priority = 5

			count < 1

		module_count_limit = {
			module = USA_machinegun_browning_50_an_m2_4x_wing
			count < 2
		}
		default_modules = {
			fighter_role_slot = ordnance_equipment

	#################################################################################### ITA Italy

	ITA_re_2001_gv_airframe = { # Reggiane Re.2001 GV `Falco II`
		year = 1942
		is_frame = no
		archetype = cv_small_bomber_airframe
		family = ITA_re_2000_airframe
		is_convertable = yes
		can_convert_from = {
			ITA_re_2001_airframe
			ITA_re_2001_or_airframe
			ITA_re_2001_g_airframe
		}
		priority = 5

		air_range = 1100		#1100
		maximum_speed = 444.3	#542
		air_agility = 43.8	#58
		air_defence = 12
		build_cost_ic = 15
		weight = 4.5

		module_slots = {
			nose_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					nose_prop_mg_2x
				}
			}
			wing_armament_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					wing_mg
					suspended_pod
				}
			}
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					small_bomb_locks_general_purpose
					medium_bomb_locks_general_purpose
					nav_bomber_weapon
				}
			}
			wing_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					small_bomb_locks_general_purpose
					drop_tanks_wings
				}
			}
			fixed_construction_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					construction_material
				}
			}
			fixed_engine_type_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					water_cooled_alfa_romeo_1x
					air_cooled_isotta_fraschini_1x
				}
			}
			fixed_armour_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					light_plane_armour
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					protection
					armoured_glass_1
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					protection
					armoured_glass_1
				}
			}
			fixed_protection_slot_3 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					protection
					armoured_glass_1
				}
			}
			fixed_ammo_slot = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
				}
			}
			fixed_crew_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					crew_equipment
				}
			}
		}
		module_count_limit = {
			module = non_strategic_materials
			count < 1
		}
		default_modules = {
			nose_slot_1 = ITA_machinegun_127mm_breda_safat_2x_nose_prop
			wing_armament_slot_1 = ITA_machinegun_77mm_breda_safat_2x_wing
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = bomb_500kg_locks_general_purpose
			wing_mount_slot_1 = bomb_100kg_locks_general_purpose
			fixed_construction_slot = metal_construction
			fixed_engine_type_slot = ITA_engine_alfa_romeo_ra1000_monsone_1x
			fixed_armour_slot = armour_light_seat
			fixed_protection_slot_1 = fire_suppression
			fixed_protection_slot_2 = self_sealing_fuel_tanks
			fixed_protection_slot_3 = armoured_glass_light
			fixed_ammo_slot = empty
			fixed_crew_slot_1 = oxygen_masks
		}
	}

	#################################################################################### ITA Italy

	ITA_sm_79_airframe = {		# Savoia-Marchetti SM.79 `Sparviero`
		year = 1936
		is_frame = no
		archetype = medium_multirole_plane_airframe
		family = ITA_sm_79_airframe

		priority = 105

		maximum_speed = 430	#430

		air_defence = 19
		build_cost_ic = 21
		weight = 32

		module_slots = {
			chin_slot_1 = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					recon_camera
					plane_special_module_bomb_sights
				}
			}
			nose_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					defense_turret_mounted
				}
			}
			defensive_armament_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					defense_turret_mounted_rear
				}
			}
			fuselage_mount_slot_1 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					small_bomb_bay_general_purpose
					small_bomb_bay_general_purpose_2
					small_bomb_bay_general_purpose_3
					medium_bomb_bay_general_purpose
					small_bomb_bay
